actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1937 to increase the funds available for projects for the removal of obstructions and the clearing of channels.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of 1937 to increase to $10,000,000 the amount of flood control funds available for making channel improvements. Increases to $500,000 the amount that may be spent on any single tributary.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1937 to increase the funds available for projects for the removal of obstructions and the clearing of channels.
